programme.title: St Patrick's parade ban
programme.short_synopsis: The ban of homosexuals and bisexuals from the St Patrick's Day parade by Boston veterans.
programme.medium_synopsis: The ruling allowing a group of Boston war veterans to ban homosexuals and bisexuals from the St Patricks Day parade, and the division it has caused in America.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
